home.how_works_subtitle: Create your itinerary in a few simple clicks!
home.main_subtitle: Plan your next trip to Umbria without stress!
home.how_works_desc2: helps you create personalized itineraries based on your preferences and other constraints you set.
home.subtitle1: CHIP has been developed within the
home.subtitle3: : Realt√† Aumentata e Story-Telling Automatizzato per la valorizzazione di Beni Culturali ed Itinerari - Augmented Reality and Automated Storytelling

step.preferences_desc: Are you passionate about culture, sports or maybe good food? Let us know what you love by selecting from a wide variety of options! This way, we can suggest the Points of greatest Interest, perfectly in line with your tastes and passions.
step.ranking_desc: From the ranking of Points Of Interest selected specifically for you based on your preferences, choose the ones that fascinate you and the ones to avoid.
step.constraints_desc: Indicate the Means of transport, the Starting Point and other Time Constraints. This information will help us create a tailor-made itinerary, in line with your needs.
step.itinerary_desc: Discover one or more custom itinerary options. Choose the one that best suits your tastes and preferences for a unique and unforgettable travel experience!
step.start_now_desc: Start now by creating your first Itinerary!

handle_poi.has_been_changed: Show only POI with description changed
handle_poi.has_score_changed: Show only POIs that have had their scores manually changed

handle_poi.upload_image: Upload an image of the POI

visualization.degree_similarity: Choose the desired degree of similarity between the POIs:

visualization.toi_similarity: Select TOIs with which to calculate the similarity between the POIs

tooltip.switch_PCA: Switch to PCA Feature Reduction Layout

viz_label.instructionsTextNoLinks: Click on a POI (node) to highlight it

dialog.title: Save Preferences
dialog.content: Do you want to save your preferences as final?

ranking.info_button: Yes: will prioritize this POI for inclusion in the itinerary. Maybe: will leave the choice to the algorithm based on overall preferences. Not: will exclude this POI.
ranking.sub_title: These are the POIs that best suit your preferences
ranking.remove_from_inclusion: Remove the POI from the included
ranking.include_poi: Include the POI in the itinerary
ranking.maybe_poi: Leave the choice to the algorithm
ranking.remove_from_exclusion: Remove the POI from the excluded
ranking.exclude_poi: Exclude the POI from the itinerary

constraints.current_position_error: Geolocation not active. Try to activate it or choose a different starting point!
constraints.n_alternatives: Number of alternative itineraries to show
constraints.sub_title: Send us the constraints that the tour must satisfy!
constraints.point_duration: Maximum duration of the visit for each point of interest
constraints.poi_to_include: Select POIs you want to visit
constraints.poi_to_exclude: Select POIs you don't want to visit

verify_email.title: Click on the button to verify your email

validator_strings.min_pwd: The password must be at least 8 characters long
validator_strings.uppercase_pwd: The password must contain at least one capital letter
validator_strings.lowercase_pwd: The password must contain at least one lowercase letter
validator_strings.symbol_pwd: The password must contain at least one special symbol between @, $, !, %, *, #, ?, &, ^, _, -
validator_strings.max_pwd: The password must be less than 30 characters
validator_strings.number_pwd: The password must contain at least a number
validator_strings.min_toi: Score must be higher or equal than 0
validator_strings.max_toi: Score must be less or equal than 10
